name: DataFeed
author: NovaVoidHowl
description:
This mod provides a Data Feed of additional parameters from ChilloutVR to avatars via animator and also via localhost REST/Websocket API
Please see source link for more information
changelog:
- Updated for CVR 2025r181 API changes
 - Fixed browser overlay CORS/connection issues
 - Added multi-host binding (localhost, 127.0.0.1, IPv6)
 - Fixed missing avatar/world metadata (authors, tags, file sizes)
